#include<stdio.h>

main()
{
	int T,r1,r2,r3,ways=0,n;
	scanf("%d",T);
	while(T--)
	{
		scanf("%d",n);
		ways=0;
		for(r1=n;r1>=0;r1-=6)
		{
			//cout<<"\nr1: "<<r1<<" ways: "<<ways;
			for(r2=r1;r2>=0;r2-=4)
			{	
				//cout<<"\nr2: "<<r2<<" ways: "<<ways;
				for(r3=r2;r3>=0;r3-=2)
				{
					//cout<<"\nr3: "<<r3<<" ways: "<<ways;
					ways++;
				}	
			}
		}
		printf("%d\n",ways);
		//cout<<ways<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
